archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0322
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Transitioning customers need to be able to carry forward IFP agreements including IFP payment start date and term

properties.value: Intention is to match to the agreement as defined in DX, only moving forward the start date Also relation between interest free device and a plan? Yes, relation to be considered. Cannot move a device without a plan. This will be managed by the transition app.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
